os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All 32-bit MS Windows (95/98/NT/2000/XP)

name: qt_pattern_set_creator
short_description:
This program is a simple GUI that is intended to allow test engineers to quickly pull file names from various subfolders and organize them into pattern sets. 

The pattern file information is organized into separate spreadsheets for each pattern set.  The information can then be saved to .xml where it can be imported into a test program workbook or post processed with .xsl into any target system format.
summary: A GUI to allow quick building of pattern sets for ATE test
